name: Princess Makeover New
description:
Design the best fashion styles in the world! These princess kids need your help dressing up for the season. Design a new fashion for them to wear, give their hair a tidy cut, and clean them up for the whole world to see. There's nothing like turning a princess into an even more beautiful princess, and all it takes is a little fashion styling from you!

First, she'll need to get cleaned up a bit. These girls can't stay neat and tidy all the time, you know! Wash her hair and give it a good cut to take away all those loose ends. then bring her to the dressing room for the final touches. Each of these kids needs a new dress to stand out from the crowd. Design an amazing outfit and your princess is ready to go!

Features:
- Dress up beautiful girls with the top fashions fit for a princess!
- Use shampoo to clean each kid's Face. So messy!
- Head to the dressing room to complete the makeover with a gorgeous outfit!

How to Play:
- Use the touch screen to select shampoo, Other tools and fashions.
- Add makeup and choose hairstyles with the touch screen.
